CELEBRATING NEW BEGINNINGS

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=323&user=10620> 	

We understand that to live up to our purpose and truly inspire, exhilarate, and delight our customers and people, we must embrace diversity, culture, background, abilities, and perspectives. Last week, we welcomed our 21 People of Determination who have recently joined our Logistics team in the Main Warehouse in Dubai, further strengthening our commitment to fostering an environment where everyone can thrive, contribute meaningfully, and build long-term careers with our Group.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	
National Graduate Programme 

"Hello, I'm Narjes Ashkanani!

I hold a bachelorâ€™s in Psychology from Swansea University. Living abroad alone has been a transformative journey, fostering self-reliance and personal growth.

I joined Chalhoub Group last year through the National Graduate Programme in Kuwait, stepping into marketing despite my psychology background. This programme has given me invaluable knowledge and hands-on experience, bridging theory and practice.."
